Template used: "Can I choose/schedule a delivery date? "; last updated: 2025-03-07 15:15:35.050

DreamCloud: Thank you for your interest! Different mattresses and sizes have different shipping times. Delivery typically takes 2 - 5 business days once your mattress has shipped, and could arrive via FedEx Ground delivery. While we don't have an option to schedule a delivery date, we can hold your order until a specific ship date. To place your order, please call us at (833) 237-3269 or email support@dreamcloudsleep.com, and our team will help you place an order with a scheduled ship date. 

In the meantime, you can check our bundles here: https://dreamcloud.attn.tv/aXCYnEMyXhSk

templates: For custom full vehicle covers use FVC shortcut
For cx that can't see the cover pattern/images of their vehicle use CPI shortcut
If we don't have a pattern/color the cx is looking for use PRR shortcut
dos_and_donts: Do not tell customers that the base price is the final price! The cost changes by the fitment and depends on the vehicle
Rebates are discounts for this brand!
Custom dim pattern sheets are only available for Vehicle Covers (Car, Truck, Van,RV)
drive_to_purchase: Before sharing any product links, confirm the vehicle’s Year, Make, and Model
